projects.name: KDA Akali Click Game
projects.description: Akali is a League of Legends Champion, and this game is a memory based click game that shuffles after every click.

projects.name: Project X
projects.description: Project X is a choose your own adventure game, utilizing Particle.js, mysql and materialize css.

projects.name: Shoppinator
projects.description: Shoppinator is a shopping app that allows you to take a picture of an object and retrieves the nearest stores.

projects.name: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: Weather Dashboard is simple and easy to use to find the weather in any part of the country using openWeather api.

projects.name: Workday Scheduler
projects.description: Workday Scheduler is a simple easy to use task saver that holds persistant data and highlights the current hour.

projects.name: Animation Transitions
projects.description: Transitions are keyframed in UIKit for the IOS.

projects.name: Demo Reel
projects.description: Animation Demo reel of various motion capture and keyframed shots.
